constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 145 (Tuesday, August 10, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CASE:
H.R. 4988.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H4325]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: To amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to establish that reconciliation directives in a budget resolution may not cause a net increase in the deficit for the period of fiscal years covered by that resolution.
